Just started downloading. But when I d/l Assassin's Creed: Brotherhood, it was 3.50. What I had to do was install the game files first, basically the installation patch. Google around for "Hot pursuit ps3 patch" it'll be in a .pkg file and be called "BLESxxxxxx..." not "BLUS" or "BLJS." The third letter in a game's id number is the region, and this is a euro game.

Find the patch, download the retail, not the debug.

hey firstly i hate to sound like a noob but how do i get this to work on my PS3 and secondly is this game in english

What you need to do to get this game to work on PS3 3.55!!!

Go to youtube and type in 
"How To Install Wutangrza CFW on PS3 - Backups On 3.55"

-Christ techtv explains it real well also provides all the links to what you need

1) Unpack rar somewhere.

2) Transfer the folder to the directory your backup manager uses (either Games, Gamez or some other)
2.a) PS3 doesn't digest NTFS, so you better use FTP transfer (install FileZilla on your PC and BlackBox FTP on the PS3)
2.b) If you have a nice and large external memory device with FAT32 file system, just copy it there, plug into your PS3 and use some kind of a file manager (MultiMan will do) to copy the game from usb to the folder your backup manager uses.

3) Launch your backup manager on PS3

4) Find your game in the list

5) Press LOAD.
5.1)Note that you sometimes need to have a legitimate blu ray inside the PS3

6) Exit to XMB

7) Launch the game that should be loaded by now and look like it's on the bluray you have inserted earlier.

8) Have fun!
8.1) If you have some crashes and hangups - don't panic. Pull of the cord from your PS3 and reinsert it. It happens every now and then, but it's totally fine.

@frozoman : You can not update your jailbroken games with the automatic update on the PS3. If you do anyway the game will not work anymore but your PS3 and the hack will be fine. If you want to update JB games you must download the game update as pkg and run it on a USB drive. You can get update pkg-files on http://yifan.lu/psn/ for example. Just enter the game id and download the pkg.

@ aasimtom : The folder is BLES00949. Just view the 'PS3_DISC.SFB' file with a text editor. There you will always find the game id.

You have to use Ultra ISO or some application that extracts ISOs correctly.
The problem with winrar is that unzipping the nfs iso does not use more than 8 characters in Folders and filenams.
For example in my case the folder CHARACTERS in USRDIR was extracted as CHARACTE.
If you do not want to ftp the whole iso files again, extract the iso with ultra iso and try to find and re-upload or rename the files/folders with wrong filenames

This torrent has wrong filenames. All names over 8 characters have been shortened. Hence it'll never work unless you manually rename each and every file. Which is impossible considering there are huge number of files.
I request the uploader to correct the filenames and re-seed, otherwise this torrent is of no use.
